name: Star Wars: The Old Republic - Rise of the Hutt Cartel
name_original: Star Wars: The Old Republic - Rise of the Hutt Cartel
description:
Star Wars: The Old Republic - Rise of the Hutt Cartel is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by BioWare. It came out on 14-04-2013. It was published by Electronic Arts. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Star Wars: The Old Republic - Rise of the Hutt Cartel is available on PC.
It was produced by Dallas Dickinson. James Ohlen directed the game. Jared Emerson-Johnson, Lennie Moore, Mark Griskey and Peter McConnell scored the game.
